CustomField.description: Creates an option to append to the Conga Template Group so we can pull appropriate templates.
CustomField.formula: "_" & Conga_Document_Group_Language__c & IF(Qualified__c = True, IF(Primary_Claim_Concern__c = "Cracking", "_CAC", IF(Primary_Claim_Concern__c = "Granule Loss", "_CAG", "_ORGANIC")), "_ORGANIC") & IF( ISPICKVAL(Settlement_Type__c, "Goodwill"), "_GOODWILL", "")
CustomField.label: Conga Document Templates
